text: Arthur Hodges (1877 - 14 July 1928) was a British gymnast. He competed in the men's artistic individual all-around event at the 1908 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1877 births Category:1928 deaths Category:British male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Great Britain Category:Gymnasts at the 1908 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Birmingham, West Midlands
title: Arthur Hodges (gymnast)
